title: Is there a way to separate the pages in Google Docs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Assume you meant created a page break. Steps: Open a document in Google Docs.Click Insert Break Page break.Source: Add, edit, or remove a link, bookmark, or page break
You may choose to show your document in page mode: Zoom or change your document view And you can insert page breaks at any point using the Insert menu.
